sections.heading: and regulations.The Department of Banking and Finance has power to make such rules and regulations for the government of all associations of the character defined in sections 8-301 to 8-340
sections.text: 01 as may, in its judgment, seem wise and expedient.SourceLaws 1899, c. 17, ยง 20, p. 98;R.S.1913, ยง 510;Laws 1
